item.title: Raiffeisen 称正根据欧洲央行的命令加快俄罗斯清盘进程
item.description: Raiffeisen Bank International AG 表示，该公司正在加快努力，以满足减少在俄罗斯业务的监管要求。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG said it is accelerating efforts to meet regulatory demands to reduce business in Russia.】

item.title: Glencore 将于下周宣布煤炭开采业务的前景
item.description: 在本月早些时候完成对泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）煤矿的收购后，Glencore Plc 表示将在下周的业绩会上宣布是否计划分拆煤炭业务。【原文：Glencore Plc said it will announce whether it plans to spin off its coal business at its results next week, after completing the purchase of Teck Resources Ltd.’s coal mines earlier this month.】

item.title: 英国石油公司保持稳定回购，提高股息以稳定利润
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在公布第二季度稳定利润的同时，保持了股票回购的步伐，并增加了股息。【原文：BP Plc maintained the pace of its share buybacks and increased its dividend as it posted a stable profit for the second quarter.】

item.title: 泰国政府批准旨在促进环境、社会和公司治理投资的措施
item.description: 泰国政府批准了旨在通过增加税收减免和减少个人投资所谓的可持续基金的锁定期来提振当地股市的措施。【原文：Thailand’s government approved measures aimed at boosting the local stock market by increasing tax breaks and reducing lockups for individuals investing in so-called sustainable funds.】

item.title: 亚洲富裕投资者热捧黄金，抵消了珠宝业的低迷
item.description: 飙升的金价阻碍了珠宝和牙科等传统应用领域的需求，但富裕的亚洲投资者贪婪的胃口足以抵消其他方面的下降。【原文：Soaring gold prices are hobbling demand for traditional applications like jewelry and dentistry, but wealthy Asian investors’ voracious appetite is more than offsetting the other declines.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：富时 100 指数将在盈利潮中下挫
人民币交易员在短暂反弹中缓和看跌情绪
item.description: 对中国人民银行来说，一个值得欢迎的迹象是，交易商越来越关注人民币升值而非贬值的对冲。【原文：In a welcome sign for the People’s Bank of China, traders are increasingly more concerned about hedging a yuan rise than a fall.】

item.title: 法国经济增长超出预期，提振欧元区经济
item.description: 法国第二季度的经济增长强于预期，这是在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的临时大选引发政治动荡之前法国经济复苏的一个迹象。【原文：France’s economic growth was stronger than anticipated in the second quarter, a sign of resilience before the political turmoil triggered by President Emmanuel Macron’s snap election.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: 纽约梅隆对土耳其市场过度乐观持谨慎态度
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（BNY Mellon）警告说，外国资本涌入土耳其资产的势头可能过猛，投资者很可能忽视了可能促使土耳其资产逆转的隐患。【原文：BNY Mellon is warning that the influx of foreign capital into Turkish assets may be overdone, with investors likely ignoring pitfalls that could prompt a reversal.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司重启公司首次零售债券销售计划
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）集团的旗舰企业阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）计划重启有史以来的首次债券公开销售。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd., the flagship firm of Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s group, plans to revive its first-ever public sale of bonds.】

item.title: 美联储何时才能最终下山？
item.description:
美国看起来比以往任何时候都更加孤独。FOMC 的选择似乎是首次降息，或者向降息迈出一步。【原文：

The US looks lonelier than ever at peak rates. The FOMC’s options seem to be a first cut, or a step toward it. 

】

item.title: 美国无证移民纳税近 1000 亿美元
item.description: 一份新的报告显示，无证移民缴纳了近 1000 亿美元的税款，凸显了边境政策对国家税收的重要性。【原文：Undocumented immigrants paid almost $100 billion of taxes, underscoring the importance of border policies on the country’s tax collections, according to a new report.】

item.title: 欧洲盈利警告不断增加，股票牛市遭受重创
item.description: 在需求疲软的背景下，许多欧洲最大的公司正在下调利润目标，这对今年的股市反弹构成了威胁。【原文：Many of Europe’s biggest companies are adjusting their profit targets lower on the back of weak demand, posing a threat to this year’s stock rally.】

item.title: 中国债券狂潮刷新纪录，与中国人民银行一决高下
item.description: 中国的债券涨势达到了前所未有的水平，促使投资者询问央行是最终决定挤出投机者，还是任由市场火热以帮助经济发展。【原文：China’s bond rally has hit unprecedented levels, prompting investors to ask whether the central bank will finally decide to squeeze out speculators or let the market run hot to help the economy.】

item.title: 中国股市震荡，大宗商品抹去今年涨幅
item.description: 由于中国的前景充满挑战、美国天然气下挫以及食品价格下跌，原材料受到拖累，大宗商品今年以来的涨幅已全部回落。【原文：Commodities have shed all of their gains this year as a challenging outlook in China, a selloff in US natural gas and losses in foodstuffs, weighed on raw materials.】

item.title: 印度股价创历史新高，现在亟需提高盈利水平
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 周大福面临黄金反弹风险 延长 72 亿美元套现计划
item.description: 中国最大的珠宝零售商面临着股价长期下跌的风险，因为金价飙升有可能挤压其回报并抑制需求。【原文：China’s largest jewelery retailer is at risk of a prolonged share decline as a surge in gold prices threatens to squeeze its returns and curb demand.】

item.title: 巴菲特再次减持美国银行股份，本月卸载 30 亿美元资产
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. disclosed its third disposal of Bank of America Corp. shares this month — paring its massive, profitable bet on the lender by a total of more than $3 billion.】

item.title: 170 万美元住宅竞拍狂潮席卷韩国拍卖网站
item.description: 周一，韩国民众踊跃参加豪华公寓单位的打折拍卖，政府网站崩溃长达数小时，凸显出投资者对大首尔地区火热房地产市场的强烈追捧。【原文：South Koreans piled into auction for discounted luxury apartment units on Monday, crashing the government website for several hours, underscoring strong investor appetite for the greater Seoul area’s hot property market.】

item.title: 加密货币风险投资激增，Anoma 寻求 10 亿美元估值
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，加密货币基础设施提供商 Anoma Foundation 正在洽谈以 10 亿美元的估值进行新一轮融资，这是数字资产初创企业投资反弹的最新迹象。【原文：Crypto infrastructure provider Anoma Foundation is in talks to raise fresh funding at a $1 billion valuation, people familiar with the matter said, the latest sign of rebounding digital-asset startup investment.】

item.title: 数据显示日本央行可能重点削减 10 年期债券购买量
item.description: 有关日本央行债务组合的数据显示，日本央行计划削减债券购买量的重点可能是 7 至 10 年期债券。【原文：A planned cut to the Bank of Japan’s bond purchases will probably focus on seven- to 10-year notes, data on the BOJ’s debt portfolio suggest.】

item.title: 印度将保护部分新发行债务不受外国投资影响
item.description: 根据印度中央银行的一份声明，外国投资者将不能再自由购买新发行的 14 年期和 30 年期印度政府债券。【原文：Foreign investors will no longer be able to freely buy freshly issued Indian government bonds with 14-year and 30-year tenors, according to a statement by the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 宏观观点：日元狂飙之后，日本央行可能比美联储更重要
item.description: 进入本周后，交易员们将重点关注美联储周三的会议，预计美国央行将维持政策利率不变。这就有可能低估了日本央行在同一天早些时候召开的会议给全球市场带来动荡的可能性。【原文：Traders are entering the week with a keen focus on the Federal Reserve meeting on Wednesday, where the US central bank is expected to leave its policy rate unchanged. That risks underestimating the potential of the Bank of Japan’s meeting earlier the same day to roil global markets.】

item.title: 必和必拓、伦丁将以 30 亿美元收购加拿大铜矿商 Filo
item.description: 必和必拓集团有限公司（BHP Group Ltd.）与加拿大隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining Corp）成立了一家合资企业，收购铜矿开采商 Filo Corp.，从而获得了智利和阿根廷的项目。【原文：BHP Group Ltd. has set up a joint venture with Canada’s Lundin Mining Corp. to buy copper miner Filo Corp., gaining access to projects in Chile and Argentina.】

item.title: 日本企业清理推动债务销售创纪录
item.description: 公司治理改革支撑了日本股市近 2 万亿美元的涨势，也增加了对信贷投资者的吸引力。【原文：Corporate governance reforms that have underpinned a nearly $2 trillion rally in Japanese stocks are increasing the draw for investors in credit.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好关键一周伊始，美国股市上涨。特斯拉分析师在使用 "完全自动驾驶 "时险些撞车。奥运会安保被基础设施破坏绊倒。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks rise at start of crucial week. Tesla analyst nearly crashes while using ‘full self-driving.’ Olympics security tripped up by infrastructure sabotage. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: Fortescue 投资者寻求出售价值 19 亿澳元的股票
item.description: 周一晚间，由于一家机构投资者试图出售其所持股份，一批价值高达19亿澳元（13亿美元）的Fortescue Ltd.股票在市场上流通。【原文：A block of Fortescue Ltd. shares valued at as much as A$1.9 billion ($1.3 billion) hit the market on Monday night as an institutional investor sought to sell down their stake.】

item.title: 需求担忧加剧，石油价格稳定在七周低点附近
item.description: 由于需求前景不稳，尤其是最大的进口国中国的需求前景不稳，石油交易量接近七周低点。【原文：Oil traded near a seven-week low on a shaky demand outlook, especially in the biggest importer China.】

item.title: 价格压力减轻，英国人优先考虑度假和时尚
item.description: 英国的消费者情绪达到了三年来的最高水平，这对一些零售商和旅游公司来说是假日购物季到来前的一个令人鼓舞的信号。【原文：UK consumer sentiment is at its highest level in three years, an encouraging sign for some retailers and travel companies ahead of the holiday shopping season.】
